name: CARE_SVC_LN
description: This table stores information about healthcare service lines. Healthcare service lines are services or sets of related services that an organization is able to provide to a patient. They are used when coordinating post-discharge care or community resources for a patient.

columns.name: SVC_LN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the service line record.

columns.name: SVC_LN_NAME
columns.description: The name (.2 item) of the service line record.
